javascript:(function(){for(const t of document.querySelectorAll('[target="_blank"],[formtarget="_blank"]'))"_blank"==t.getAttribute("target")&&t.setAttribute("target","_self"),"_blank"==t.getAttribute("formtarget")&&t.setAttribute("formtarget","_self");var t=window._origOpen=window.open;window.open=function(e,r,n){return"_blank"===r&&(r="_self"),t(e,r,n)}})();
